name: High Damage Cleric or Favoured soul of Shaundakul
author: Lucas1980

posts.author: Lucas1980
posts.content:
Hi guys, I'm in search of a build for this roleplay pg Idea.
The pg will be played on a 30level cap server, with long long time to reach it, so he must be character playable from 1 to 30lev.
The idea is a globetrotting boy, cleric or favoured soul of shaundakul, who goes around with his faithful big sword. 
The character must have at most three classes (3base class or 2base class +1PC) compatible with each other, it's for a roleplay server.

I wish I could have as many  skill points as possible (2-3 per level) to spend on roleplay skills.
At a technical level I just have a good damage output and a good AC.

Help me! ^_^

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Cleric of the God of Winds eh?

Well, Clerics do not need much help to be effective so something simple will work fine.
Try Cleric 24/ Fighter 6 (Cleric 16/ Fighter 4 pre-epic), strength-based and you shall be fine.
I am assuming Arelith server that's why I avoided single dips in other classes.

Make sure you take spell focus/greater spell focus in evocation pre-epic, then follow-up with epic spell focus. Take extent & empower spell as well.
The rest of your feats should be weapon focus in greatsword, improved critical, blind-fight, knockdown, weapon specialization, power attack & cleave.
In epic levels, you should also take epic prowess, epic weapon focus, epic weapon specialization, armour skin & great wisdom I.

Attributes (Starting/Final):
Str: 16(20), Dex: 8, Con: 14, Int: 12, Wis: 16(20), Cha: 8
